I purchased this cheery red sweater for a Christmas party. It is a nicely manufactured, light weight sweater.. the sleeves are nice (for me amazing because I have longer arms) fitted perfect to the wrist. I plan on replacing the buttons with rhinestone buttons (more an retro look) although the buttons on the sweater are simplistic and pretty and if you wanted to, you can buy button covers! I highly recommend this nice little sweater.. and I plan to purchase other colors. I really like the white accent because it makes it different from most cardigans. For comparison, I’m 5-8 and 179. XL worked well for me.
This sweater was a good purchase.  It is soft and fit well. The black with white trim gives it a very sharp look. I wore it buttoned up but you could wear it open with a top under it.

评论概述: Runs Slightly Small, Is Quite Thin
评论详情: I recently ordered this cardigan and it runs slightly small on me. I am 5'1" and chesty, and I can't button it without it puckering open at the bust. It looks somewhat cute if worn open, but not as elegant as if would if it were able to be buttoned. This is a very thin cardigan; I ordered a different one recently and that one is really thick and warm. This one feels more like a 'it looks like a sweater but it's only slightly warmer than a tee shirt' type of weight. If you're wearing it in warm weather over a tank, it'd be okay. If you're seeking warmth, seek elsewhere.

评论概述: Nice sweater, just needs an extra button
评论详情: I really love this sweater. It's very soft, super stretchy, and looks great on. My only issue is that if you're busty like me there's a huge gap between the buttons that cover the chest. 评论概述: Kept it for a Lovely Gift!
评论详情: I love the look very much! You could dress this up or dress it down! This sweater wasn't true to size. I bought a XXL  & l believe it would fit a Med good & maybe a Large. But not an XL or XXL. Nevertheless, l kept it anyway. I would've ret'd it for a bigger size, but XXL was the largest size available. I will use it for a fall birthday gift or maybe even a Christmas gift. Whoever gets this will love it as much as l did. Very seldom do l not give 5 stars, but it just wasn't true to size. As far as Well Made, Looks  & A REAL BARGAIN...It would have scored a 10 by me  if that was permissable!
